column3: Who disturbs the gloom?<hex:02100103>Ahhh, mortals from the realm of light.<hex:02100103>You have not stumbled here without purpose...
I am the Cloud of Darkness.<hex:02100103>What I do not smother, I devour.<hex:02100103>What I cannot devour, I destroy.
The covenant is everlasting.<hex:02100103>All mortals before the flood of darkness<hex:02100103>will sink lifeless into the void!
